name: gamehost-control-panel
description: Open-source game server control panel with Docker integration

scripts.setup:quick: npm run install:all && npm run db:setup && npm run build && npm run verify
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.db:setup: cd backend && npm run generate && npm run migrate
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules frontend/node_modules backend/node_modules frontend/dist backend/dist

author: GameHost Control Panel Team
